entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:17 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 02:20 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: SE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:47 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:47 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:47 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
